Events that occurred on 23 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1946 - Philologist G.H. Cowling dies.
1997 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 11 is published.
2004 - The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy episode "Here Thar Be Dwarves" is aired.
2004 - Starter decks of "The Weta Collection", a special set of The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, are released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Théoden travels toward Edoras
